name.title: Name
name.description: The name or title of the intangible creation manifested by the identified digital asset

description.title: Description
description.description: Description of the digital asset identified by the ISCC (used as input for Meta-Code generation). Any user presentable text string (including Markdown text) indicative of the identity of the referent may be used.

image.title: Image
image.description: URI for a user presentable image that serves as a preview of identified digital content or, in case of an NFT, the digital content itself.

keywords.title: Keywords
keywords.description: List of keywords relevant to the identified digital content.

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: Other identifier(s) such as those defined by ISO/TC 46/SC 9 referencing the work, product or other abstraction of which the referenced digital asset is a full or partial manifestation.

filename.title: Filename
filename.description: Filename of the referenced digital asset (automatically used as fallback if no seed_title element is specified)

filesize.title: Filesize
filesize.description: File size of media asset in bytes.

tophash.title: tophash
tophash.description: Blake3 hash over concatenation of metahash and datahash

duration.title: Duration
duration.description: Duration of audio-visual media in secondes.

fps.title: Fps
fps.description: Frames per second of video assets.

width.title: Width
width.description: Width of visual media in pixels.

height.title: Height
height.description: Height of visual media in pixels.

characters.title: Characters
characters.description: Number of text characters (code points after Unicode normalization)

language.title: Language
language.description: Language(s) of content (BCP-47) in weighted order.

license.title: License
license.description: URI of license for the identified digital content.

redirect.title: Redirect
redirect.description: URL to which a resolver should redirect an ISCC-ID that has been minted from a declartion that includes the IPFS-hash of this metadata instance.
